rules_text:
Swarming Midden enters tapped unless you control a basic Swamp.
{T}: Add {B}.
{1}{B}{B}: Swarming Midden becomes a 2/3 black Rat creature with menace until end of turn. It's still a land. Whenever it attacks this turn, create a 1/1 black Rat creature token with “This creature can't block.”
